biotools.summary:
Database of genomic and transcriptomic variations in domestic dog (Canis lupus familiaris).

CanISO enables to facilitate expression-based analysis at gene- and transcript isoform-level in each sample, in a group (normal or tumor), and between both conditions. Since GTEx data in human is included into CanISO database, comparison function can also be supported between samples of dogs and humans.

bioschemas.name: CanISO
